text: Maggie Michael is an Egyptian journalist based in Cairo. She won a 2019 Pulitzer Prize for International Reporting and 2019 Michael Kelly Award. She covered the civil war in Yemen from 2015 to 2019. == References == == Other websites == *meet-journalist-maggie-michael pulitzer center *Maggie Michael AP *yemens-dirty-war-a-qa-with-pulitzer-winner-maggie-micheal/ gijn Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Egyptian journalists Category:Pulitzer Prize winners
title: Maggie Michael
